attributes.action: Require eBay to be governed by an Ombudsman to consider disputes and practices.
attributes.background: Members complain that eBay makes arbitrary decisions which it does not explain and ignores or suspends members who protest. The result can be the end of a thriving business dependent on eBay trade. Protection offered in most other financial matters but not in the operation of this huge marketplace.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of eBay, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change how online selling sites are regulated. 

You can find out more information about your rights as a consumer on the Citizens Advice website:
https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/
